actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to revise the method by which cost-of-living adjustments are made in civil service retirement annuities.

summary.text: Eliminates the one percent increase which is added to cost of living adjustments of Federal civil service annuities. Includes in the first annuity payment after such an adjustment an additional amount to compensate annuitants for increases in the price index for the three months immediately preceding the adjustment.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to revise the method by which cost-of-living adjustments are made in civil service retirement annuities.
